reviewText: I SAW THIS MOVIE AS A CHILD, I DID NOT APPRECIATE OR UNDERSTAND WHAT THE MESSAGE WAS, FORTUNATELY I SOUGHT THE MOVIE OUT AND FOUND IT, BROUGHT TEARS TO MY EYES I HAVE SUBSEQUENTLY PASSED IT ON TO MY CHILDREN AND GRANDCHILDREN I HOPE THEY EXPERIENCED THE EMOTION THAT I FELT

For anyone who has a fond memory of this amazing docudrama--skip this release.  Product looks and sounds as if it were copied from a budget VHS 20 years ago.  Ranks up there with THE DEVILS, and FABIOLA for worst print of all time.
